## Preliminary Setup

```{r}
library(datasets)
library(ggplot2)

# load data table into the abbreviation
mtc <- mtcars

# Use factor to label transmission
mtc$Transmission <- as.factor(mtc$am)
levels(mtc$Transmission) <- c("Auto", "Manual")

ggplot(data = mtc, aes(x = Transmission, y = mpg))+ geom_boxplot + ggtitle("")

fit <- lm(mpg ~ am, data =mtc)
```
